entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
